nodes.name: Chargen Scenarios
nodes.summary: Alternate Start and chargen overhaul. Over 60 scenarios. Chargen process streamlined and re-ordered. Fully customise your character or randomise everything.

nodes.name: Sigil Stones
nodes.summary: Adds Oblivion-style Sigil Stones containing a random enchantment which can be applied to an item in your inventory.

nodes.name: The Dark Shard
nodes.summary: After a Guild Guide teleportation goes horribly wrong, your quest to discover the mysteries of the Dark Shard will take you beyond the edges of Nirn itself.

nodes.name: Shop Around
nodes.summary: This mod allows you to purchase goods from merchants by activating the items directly.

nodes.name: Joy of Painting
nodes.summary: Adds a feature-rich painting mechanic to Morrowind, letting you create paintings of in-game scenery that exist not just in the game as objects but are also saved as high-res images

nodes.name: Key Scroller
nodes.summary: A simple quality of life MWSE mod that allows you to use the keyboard to scroll through vertical scroll pane buttons.

nodes.name: Ultimate Fishing
nodes.summary: Adds a fishing mechanic with over 25 species of fish and dynamic fishing animations.

nodes.name: Been There Done That
nodes.summary: Shows you which dungeons have been cleared in the tooltip and map menu.

nodes.name: Pet the Damn Scrib
nodes.summary: Activate a scrib to pet it. It'll do a little butt thump.

nodes.name: Realistic Archery
nodes.summary: Arrows and thrown weapons always do damage when they hit a target, but projectiles are less accurate at lower marksman levels, and damage is reduced at close range.

nodes.name: Item Browser
nodes.summary: Item Browser allows you to search, browse and preview any item in the game, and add them to your inventory. Powered by the Crafting Framework.

nodes.name: Auto Attack
nodes.summary: This mod adds an auto-attack toggle hotkey. MCM for configuring hotkey, attack speed and message display.

nodes.name: DRIP - Dynamic Randomised Item Properties
nodes.summary: Drip adds Diablo 2 style loot to Morrowind. Unique weapons, armor, clothing and accesories are dynamically generated, with over a hundred unique modifiers and more than a million

nodes.name: The Crafting Framework
nodes.summary: The Crafting Framework is library that allows modders to quickly and easily implement complex crafting mechanics in Morrowind.

nodes.name: Skoomaesthesia
nodes.summary: Adds new skooma mechanics including animated skooma pipe smoking, psychedelic shaders and sound effects, and skooma addiction.

nodes.name: Guarno Coffee
nodes.summary: A rare Ashlander delicacy, guarno coffee is brewed from partially digested comberries harvested from guar droppings.

nodes.name: Dynamic Book Size Adjuster
nodes.summary: Adjusts the scale of placed books to a more realistic size.

nodes.name: Just Drop It
nodes.summary: Dropped items and corpses are automatically positioned and oriented to align with the ground.

nodes.name: Ashfall - A Camping Survival and Needs Mod
nodes.summary: Survival mod with hunger, thirst, tiredness, cooking, camping, crafting and temperature mechanics, and new visuals, from seeing frost on your breath in cold weather, watching your

nodes.name: Hostility Indicator
nodes.summary: Hold down a hotkey to show a tooltip which indicates the hostility level of distant NPCs and Creatures. Uses MWSE-Lua.

nodes.name: Unique Shield of the Undaunted
nodes.summary: Modjam 2020 entry: Gives the Shield of the Undaunted a unique mesh with an Ashlander flair, and gives it a useful but balanced enchantment.

nodes.name: Echoes of the Fallen
nodes.summary: Drop a tombstone at the place of your death, along with an epitaph and an item from your inventory. The next character to come across the tombstone will be able to pay their

nodes.name: Right Click Menu Exit
nodes.summary: This mod provides one simple feature: any menu can be exited by right clicking. This includes dialog and barter menus, any service menus, as well as the main menu, save/load menu

nodes.name: Hidden Robe Armor
nodes.summary: This mod hides pauldrons and bracers when wearing a robe. Includes MCM menu for full customisation.

nodes.name: Quick Equip
nodes.summary: Holding down a hotkey (default left shift) while clicking an item in your inventory will equip that item instead of picking it up. Uses MWSE+Lua.

nodes.name: The Midnight Oil - Lighting Overhaul
nodes.summary: Toggle lights on and off. Town lights turn off during the day. Lights no longer destroyed underwater. Lanterns aren't destroyed when they run out of fuel. Refill lanterns with

nodes.name: Less Aggressive Creatures
nodes.summary: Allows you to create a list of creatures which will have a chance to be spawned passively, with an MCM option to set the passive chance. Defaults to a 50% chance of non-diseased

nodes.name: Accidental Theft Protection
nodes.summary: Prevents you from stealing items or opening owned containers unless you are sneaking. Items/containers can be blacklisted in the MCM.

nodes.name: The Guar Whisperer
nodes.summary: Allows your to tame and breed guars, and keep them as companions. Intelligent command menu gives unprecedented control over your guar. Attack enemies, fetch items, harvest plants

nodes.name: Misc Mates
nodes.summary: NPCs will allow you to take small inexpensive items if their disposition towards you is high enough. The disposition required is based on the gold value of the item and the

nodes.name: Class Description Tooltip
nodes.summary: Restores the description tooltip to the vanilla class selection menu.

nodes.name: Merlord's Starting Equipment
nodes.summary: Adds starting equipment, based on the items seen in the images in the class selection screen for vanilla classes, or on major/minor skills for custom classes. Compatible with

nodes.name: Book Worm
nodes.summary: Keep track of what books you have read by showing a "(Read)" indicator next to their names. You can also see a list of previously read books in the MCM menu.

nodes.name: Defensive Stance
nodes.summary: Crouching with a shield equipped increases your block and reduces your speed.

nodes.name: Merlord's Character Backgrounds
nodes.summary: Select from 27 different backgrounds, each with their own unique effects.

nodes.name: Go Fletch
nodes.summary: Go Fletch adds a brand new Fletching skill to the game, utilising the latest skill and crafting frameworks in MWSE to fully integrate it into the vanilla UI.

nodes.name: No Combat Menu
nodes.summary: No Combat Menu prevents you from accessing your inventory menu, as well as preventing looting containers/corpses, while you are in combat.

nodes.name: Kill Command
nodes.summary: Adds a configurable hotkey that will send all companions to attack whatever you are currently looking at.

nodes.name: Marksman Rebalanced
nodes.summary: Takes into account the distance to target when calculating the hit chance for ranged weapons. This applies to both the player and NPCs. Crouching also provides a boost to hit

nodes.name: Quick Loadouts
nodes.summary: Quick Loadouts adds hotkeys for equipping entire sets of gear. You can customise whether a loadout includes weapons, armor, clothing and accessories in the MCM menu.

nodes.name: Limited Intervention
nodes.summary: This mod limits the number of times you can cast Divine and ALMSIVI Intervention, based on your ranks in the Divine Cult and Tribunal Temple, respectively. MCM settings allow you

nodes.name: Realistic Repair
nodes.summary: Realistic Repair overhauls the repair mechanic, by making it so that repair hammers can only be used by activating an anvil, and prongs used by activating a forge.

nodes.name: Bed Buddies
nodes.summary: Bed Buddies prevents you from sleeping in owned beds unless the owner really likes you. Disposition requirement is based on your Personality. Attempting to sleep in an owned bed no

nodes.name: Shut the Fuck up Cliff Racers
nodes.summary: Shut the Fuck Up, Cliff Racers! drastically reduces the frequency of idle Cliff Racer screeches, by editing the kf file of the cliff racer mesh. In the vanilla file, cliff racers

nodes.name: GMST Menu
nodes.summary: Edit literally every GMST in the game, while you're in the game!

nodes.name: EasyMCM (deprecated)
nodes.summary: Library for creating Mod Config Menus for MWSE mods.

nodes.name: Immersive Mining
nodes.summary: Mine ore by actually swinging a pick axe at it. Uses latest MWSE+Lua

nodes.name: Skills Module
nodes.summary: Skills Module is a framework for MWSE+Lua mods that allows you to easily create new skills in Morrowind with just a few lines of code. Leveling and UI are handled automatically,

nodes.name: Brutal Backstabbing
nodes.summary: Introduces a backstabbing mechanic - do more damage when stabbing an enemy from behind (based on Agility/Sneak). Mod Configuration Menu includes option for Short Blades only or all

nodes.name: Automated Ammo Equip
nodes.summary: Switch between bows and crossbows without having to change ammo manually.! This mod automatically equip the first ammo of the correct type from your inventory when equipping a bow

nodes.name: Frostwind - a camping survival mod
nodes.summary: A comprehensive cold weather survival mod, inspired by Skyrim's Frostfall. Craft tents, harvest firewood, make campfires, and battle the elements.

nodes.name: Guar Taxi Service
nodes.summary: Adds Guar cart fast travel services in Seyda Neen, Pelagiad, Suran and Dren Plantation

nodes.name: Immersive Alcohol
nodes.summary: Get drunk, black out, lose your pants, become addicted, suffer withdrawals, get clean.

nodes.name: The Brew Master
nodes.summary: Ever wanted to brew your own mazte, greef, shein or sujamma? Well now you can! This mod allows you to use a brewing station to turn fresh local ingredients into delicious booze.

nodes.name: Moon Sugar Thief
nodes.summary: This mod adds chests containing Moon Sugar to various NPC's houses in Morrowind.

nodes.name: Skooma Dealer
nodes.summary: This mod adds a dialog option to sell Skooma to any non-slave Khajiit, as well as a number of other sketchy individuals. Price is based on disposition and player stats

nodes.name: Vampiric Glamour
nodes.summary: Being a vampire ain't easy. This mod adds a new power called "Vampiric Glamour", which let's you hide your vampirism for 60 seconds once a day.

nodes.name: Bardic Inspiration
nodes.summary: Learn songs from other bards. Book performances with innkeepers. 38 songs to learn. New 'Performance' skill. Dynamic replacement of vanilla lutes with equippable versions.

nodes.name: Create Skooma
nodes.summary: Use skooma pipe to craft skooma from moonsugar. Success rate based on alchemy level
